name: Ch.11ABaseConvo5
_source: transition;close;500
change_background;Camp_Tent
#music;41 Sorrow;300
music;09- Distant Roads Orchestral Cover
transition;open;500
multi_add_portrait;Joshua;Left;Vanessa;FarRight;Tana;Right
speak;Vanessa;Did you see that?|The way he held his utensils?
speak;Tana;I did!|Perfectly proper positioning, just like at the royal court.
speak;Joshua;You know I can hear you two, right?|I'm sitting right here.
speak;Vanessa;Joshua, no ordinary mercenary eats with such... refinement.
speak;Joshua;*shrugs*|A man can't enjoy his meal with proper manners?
speak;Tana;And yesterday, I saw you reading that history tome.|You were analyzing the battle tactics like a scholar.
speak;Joshua;I like to gamble.|Knowing history helps predict outcomes.
speak;Vanessa;There's more to your story than you're telling us.
speak;Joshua;*flips coin*|Life's a gamble, and everyone has secrets.
speak;Tana;As a princess, I can recognize royal training when we see it.|Those mannerisms can't be faked.
speak;Joshua;A princess, huh?|*grins*|So you're experts on royalty?
speak;Vanessa;Princess Tana is heir to Frelia.|I've served in the royal court my entire life.
speak;Joshua;*adjusts hat*|Well then, I suppose I'm caught.|Would you care to wager on my true identity?
speak;Tana;I knew it!|But what royal family could you be from?
speak;Joshua;*laughs*|Care to wager where I am from?
speak;Vanessa;Stop deflecting, Joshua.|The way you carry yourself, your knowledge of politics...
speak;Joshua;My mother taught me well, that's all.|Speaking of parents, how's King Hayden these days, Princess Tana?
speak;Tana;My father...|Why do you sound like your familiar with him?
expression;Joshua;CloseEyes
speak;Joshua;Ah, my mistake.|*stands quickly*|Would you look at the time?
speak;Vanessa;You're not getting away that easily!|You know too much about royal lineages!
speak;Joshua;*backstepping*|Knowledge is power, especially at the gambling table.
speak;Tana;Wait, Joshua!|That crest on your coat—I just noticed it!
speak;Joshua;*covers emblem*|This old thing?|Won it in a card game.
speak;Vanessa;We've got you cornered now.|Admit it!
speak;Joshua;Ladies, it's been delightful...|But I never gamble when the odds aren't in my favor.
speak;Joshua;How about this—if you can beat me in a game of chance,|I'll tell you everything.|If not, no more questions.
speak;Tana;Deal!
speak;Vanessa;Ready your coins, Joshua!
speak;Joshua;*flips coin high*|Heads or tails?
speak;Tana;Heads!
speak;Joshua;*coin never comes down*|...
remove_portrait;Joshua
speak;Vanessa;Where did he go?!
speak;Tana;He... disappeared!|During the distraction!
speak;Vanessa;*sighs*|Just like royalty...|Always making dramatic exits.
multi_remove_portrait;Vanessa;Tana
give_money;1
transition;close;500
change_background
transition;open;500
music_fade_back
ignore_base_convo;Royal Suspicions**;t
